author: Leigh Beadon
description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is an anonymous comment on our post about how “neutrality” and “free speech” become excuses for bigotry: You can’t be neutral about bigotry “Neutrality” is for elements of policy, like “What should be the top tax rate” or “should we build a new interstate highway” […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
